name: vr1cl
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3

stmt.origin: syl5eqel(c1, c2, cfv(co(c1o, cmvr, c0), emptycls), wcel(c0, crg))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(co(c1o, cmvr, c0), emptycls))
-| wi(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cfv(co(c1o, cmvr, c0), emptycls), c2))

|- wi(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(co(c1o, cmvr, c0), emptycls))

body.origin:

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cfv(co(c1o, cmvr, c0), emptycls), c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cv1, c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ Ring → c1 ∈ c2)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Ring →((1o[mVar]c0)` ∅)∈ c2)
⊣ c1 =(var1 ` c0)

-| wi(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(emptycls, c1o))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ Ring →((1o[mVar]c0)` ∅)∈ c2)
⊣ (1o[mPoly]c0)=(1o[mPoly]c0)
⊣ (1o[mVar]c0)=(1o[mVar]c0)
⊣ c2 =(Base `(1o[mPoly]c0))
⊣ (c0 ∈ Ring → 1o ∈ _om)

⊣ (c0 ∈ Ring → ∅ ∈ 1o)
